Pharmacist sold stolen pharmacy-only medicine, other meds on Trade Me for $126k https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pharmacist-sold-stolen-pharmacy-only-medication-on-trade-me-earning-126k/NMKS5DPMGBC4DLKFX4UT6ELLEQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pharmacist-sold-stolen-pharmacy-only-medication-on-trade-me-earning-126k/NMKS5DPMGBC4DLKFX4UT6ELLEQ/ Natalie AkoorieJayant Patel was caught when the pharmacy owner noticed extra medication and viewed CCTV. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Registered pharmacist Jayant Patel ordered and stole extra medication from his employer before selling it online, earning $126,000 over more than four years.
